Facial.description: Deep pore cleansing via disincrustation, wax and debris collection undoes blemishes and reveal a clearer skin tone
Facial.name: Ultimate Acne Facial

Facial.description: The application of current propagated across the skin leads to a more elastic, moisture-preserving cells
Facial.name: Anti-Aging Iontophoresis

Facial.name: Galvanic Power Facial

Facial.description: Cell renewal promoted via ultrasound waves.
Facial.name: Ultrasound Facial

Facial.description: Serum for the reduction of cellulite
Facial.name: Thermo-Active Modeling

Facial.description: Includes back, hand and arm massage with hand pack application

Ayurvedic Massage.description: Traditional Hawaiian temple massage resulting in a intense release of tension such that the soul is again in harmony with the body

Ayurvedic Massage.name: Hot-Cold Stone Massage

Whole-Body.description: An herbal massage to relax and detoxify
